items.summary: Remove the in-app wallet entry point from the application navigation (desktop header nav and mobile menu) so users no longer see any Wallet/OISY Wallet item, and ensure there is no remaining user-facing wallet-related UI text or tooltip in the app navigation.
Remove unused OISY wallet configuration usage from the frontend so the app does not depend on or reference the OISY wallet URL environment variable (VITE_OISY_WALLET_URL) for any UI behavior.

Extend the backend registrant data model and APIs to support saving the following optional fields for each registrant: Facebook, Instagram, Telegram, website URL, and a crypto address, and persist these values in the registrant record returned by existing registrant read/list/search APIs.

Update the registration/profile form UI to allow authenticated users to input and save optional social links (Facebook, Instagram, Telegram, website) and an optional crypto address as part of their registrant profile, without making these fields required.
Update the directory UI to display a registrantâ€™s social links (Facebook, Instagram, Telegram, website) and crypto address when present, and hide each field when it is not provided.
